action.content:
Size her biri 5'e 5 boyutunda olan üç matris veriliyor.
Matrislerde "▢" ile işaretlenmiş boş hücreler ve "X" ile işaretlenmiş dolu hücreler vardır.
Göreviniz, hedef matrisi diğer iki çeldirici matristen ayıran ve onu en iyi şekilde tanımlayan bir referans ifadesi oluşturmaktır.
İlk matris hedef matristir ve sonraki iki matris çeldiricilerdir.

Hedef matris:

▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ X X X ▢
▢ X X X ▢
X X X X X

Çeldirici matris 1:

▢ X X X ▢
▢ X X X ▢
▢ X X X ▢
▢ X X X ▢
▢ X X X ▢

Çeldirici matris 2:

▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
X X X X X
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢

Talimat: Hedef matrisi tanımlayın.
"İfade: " etiketi ile başlayan referans ifadesini oluşturun. Diğer metinleri atlayın.

"Expression: The target matrix is characterized by a pattern of 'X' marks that form a diagonal line from the top left to the bottom right, with additional 'X' marks forming a vertical line on the right side of the matrix. This pattern is distinct from the first clutter matrix, which has a uniform pattern of 'X' marks in each row, and from the second clutter matrix, which has a horizontal line of 'X' marks in the middle of the matrix."

action.original_content: "Expression: The target matrix is characterized by a pattern of 'X' marks that form a diagonal line from the top left to the bottom right, with additional 'X' marks forming a vertical line on the right side of the matrix. This pattern is distinct from the first clutter matrix, which has a uniform pattern of 'X' marks in each row, and from the second clutter matrix, which has a horizontal line of 'X' marks in the middle of the matrix."
